popularityCurve.label: if he has surgery i'm going to obviously do all i can to try to come back next year and help this team win

clusterList.phrase: if he has surgery i'm going to obviously do all i can to try to come back next year and help this team win
you're not going to make this team that way you're not exactly freaking dick butkus out there

i've enjoyed my years for the giants i've been waiting for an opportunity like this where they say ok you're going to be one of our lefty guys you're going to help us out of jams in the seventh or eighth and help brian wilson out that's something i wanted here to have the team you're with be committed to you is a boost

what i have to do is tell him what i see his role is i told him that is where i see you now i said at the end of training camp you could be first team safety and on the first team nickel or you can be a second team safety and a second team nickel i said i don't know the only way we are going to know is how you practice on a day-to-day basis and as you get older we are all evaluated that way and that is what i have to do with these players with these players you come in the locker room every day i don't care if you are a first round draft choice a pro-bowl player i don't care what you have done we are going to go out there and compete every day and the best people are going to play when you have a guy like john who is year in and year out when you lose a guy like that it is tough i shared that little bit of conversation that i shared with you with our players last night any time they lose a guy like john they deserved to know exactly the conversation i had with him a month or month and a half before one thing about john lynch whatever he does he is going to be the best at it
it's pure tryout for me make a team or leave
but if i feel good maybe i'll steal a few reps in that last preseason game
you're going to need some of these young guys to fill in the needs for the roster for next year and at the same time for this year
i feel ready to play on this team and to have some continuity i'm here to make decisions hard for the coach
i've always said i don't want to be a backup in the nfl that's not something i'm thrilled about but that is the role and i have to embrace it
i like being part of this team
i don't look at it like i have a spot on the team

i realize it's going to be tough for me to come in as an 18-year-old against these men and shine right away but i'm willing to do whatever it takes to get that roster spot for the whole season and continue to grow as a player
to me this is my last chance to make it in the nhl

it's no secret for anybody that guys like luke schenn john tavares and those guys have a good shot at making our team they were on the team last year so obviously they have a good shot but we're not going to go further because there are too many question marks

as long as they're confident i'm confident i know coach k and mr colangelo will have those guys totally prepared and the way everything's run is first-rate i'm definitely saddened because of my injury that i couldn't be a part of it but i definitely think they'll bring the gold back there have been some small injuries and stuff like that but the team that they have the guys are certainly selfless and their goal is to win the gold they don't have role players but the superstars on that team are the role players you've got a guy like dwyane wade coming off the bench i played with him in 06 and he passed he played d he played hard so i think they're going to rise to the occasion and bring that gold back

but now that i'm here i'm excited about my opportunity and being in the locker room with guys like rodney tom and tedy and those guys i'm just looking forward to getting out on the field with them and seeing what we can do
if i were to be traded more than likely it would be to a team that has a good chance of making the playoffs it would be tough to leave here but i've been traded before
the silver lining is that if i would be traded i don't think there is a team that would be rebuilding right now that would take a flier on me
i can see myself in the starting lineup
i am fired up for this season i want to be a green bay packer and lead the team to a super bowl
i'm not too happy with my role but i'm going to ball anyway

i have always tried to carry myself as a leader and was in san diego in this secondary with champ bailey dre bly and hamza abdullah i'm able to focus on doing what i need to do to help this team win games and win the division and ultimately get a chance to win the super bowl i am more than willing and capable of being a leader and that is what i plan on doing
i knew i could definitely be in the top two to make the team
the coaches expect me to take the no 1 role in the backfield
i make everybody around me better i'm putting carson palmer t j houshmandzadeh marvin white brat offensive coordinator bob bratkowski first
i'm just excited to go to atlanta and play for manager bobby cox
i would love to win the team penning for my teammate clayton eggers because this is his last year
i feel like i can get guys out that's the biggest thing to help the team
as a coach you want to be playing your best ball of the year

you've got to have as many people as you can working on the field we've had a couple offensive linemen in to work out we might bring in a couple receivers who knows who we're going to bring in but we'll fill that roster spot as soon as possible
when i was watching that game i said i'd love to play for that team
you always want to make a good impression with your new team but i don't have to do too much because there are great players behind me
